lead_paragraph: Anthony Mason Jr., a senior swingman at St. John’s, will miss the rest of the season because of a torn peroneal tendon in his right foot. Mason was hurt earlier in the week, and a magnetic resonance imaging test and an ultrasound Friday afternoon revealed the extent of the injury.
